member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.IsPressed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the state of this Joystick is Pressed.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.JoystickReleased
member.summary: Raised when the state of is Released.
member.remarks: Implement this event handler and the event handler when you want to provide an action associated with Joystick activity. The state of the Joystick is passed to the delegate, so you can use the same event handler for both Joystick states.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.JoystickPressed
member.summary: Raised when the state of is Pressed.
member.remarks: Implement this event handler and the event handler when you want to provide an action associated with Joystick activity. Since the state of the Joystick is passed to the delegate, you can use the same event handler for both Joystick states.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.JoystickState
member.summary: Represents the state of the object.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.JoystickState.Pressed
member.summary: The state of Joystick is Pressed.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.JoystickState.Released
member.summary: The state of Joystick is Released.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.JoystickEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used to handle the and events.
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.Position
member.summary: Structure that contains the X and Y coordinates of the joystick from 0.0 to 1.0 (0.5 means centred).

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.Position.X
member.summary: The X coordinate of the joystick from 0.0 to 1.0 (0.5 means centred).

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Joystick.Position.Y
member.summary: The Y coordinate of the joystick from 0.0 to 1.0 (0.5 means centred).
